message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the construction and analysis of locally repairable codes, which are codes that allow for the recovery of erased symbols using only a small number of other symbols. This topic falls under the umbrella of information theory (cs.IT) and has connections to coding theory (cs.DS, cs.CC) and distributed computing (cs.DC, cs.SI).
